title: 40cm x 300cm Peel and Stick Wallpaper Black Self Adhesive Wallpaper Sticky Back Plastic Vinyl Removable Paper Decorative Living Room Bedroom Wall Table Thick Sticky Paper Furniture Stickers
features: Sticky Back Plastic Black【Thicken】Black wallpaper has a frosted matte design, which looks more textured. Increase toughness, not easy to tear. It is thicker, more durable, and colorfast.

Sticky Back Plastic Black【Self-adhesive】Peel and stick wallpaper is self-adhesive (no other glue required). Strong adhesion, not easy to fall off. This furniture sticker is safe to use and you can apply it multiple times to correct mistakes. Also won't damage wall furniture, no sticky residue.

Sticky Back Plastic Black【Easy to Use】This black self-adhesive wallpaper is easy to measure and cut. It's also easy to use, just peel off the backing paper and stick it to any dry surface. It's idea for those who don't want to invest a lot of money but want to upgrade old furniture quickly and easily.
Sticky Back Plastic Black【Easy to Clean】Made of PVC material. It's waterproof and easy to clean, just wipe with a damp towel.

Sticky Back Plastic Black【Multi-purpose】Black vinyl film is suitable for smooth surface, wall decoration, shop decoration, dining table and furniture renovation, bathroom, kitchen cabinet, fireplace, bookshelf, door, etc.
description: Product Description Modern, simple, fashionable black wallpaper can easily decorate your house and unique room. NOTE Do not remove the entire lining immediately before pasting. Otherwise, the whole wallpaper will easily stick together. Please buy enough rolls to avoid color differences between different batches. WHY CHOOSE Mercoy PEEL AND STICK WALLPAPER ? Thicken Our self adhesive wallpaper is very thick and can be pasted on the walls and furniture of any color without displaying the color of the wall and furniture. Product Features Easy to remove without residue. Not damage the surface of the object. Strong stickiness, not easy to fall off. It can be redone many times to adjust the wrong position. Easily removed without residue. Even after one year of use, it can peel off without leaving any traces A safe and easy design choice, great for both homeowners and renters! Self Adhesive Just peel and stick it. Even novices can be pasted neatly. You can adjust the wrong position without damaging the wall and with no sticky residue. Waterproof We use vinyl waterproof material. The excellent waterproof performance can effectively protect the wall. Easy to Clean The surface is matte design to clean the stains well. Just wipe it gently with a wet towel. Easy to Cut There is a grid design on the back of the wallpaper, which can be measured and cut well. Our peel and stick wallpaper are suitable for any smooth and flat surface. Give full play to your imagination, DIY creation! How to Use Black Sticky Back Plastic? Clean the surface and keep the surface clean and dry. Tear off the bottom paper and paste from top to bottom. The paper will be gradually applied. (Do not remove the entire backing immediately) Use a soft flat cloth to apply pressure evenly from the center to the edges to eliminate wrinkles and bubbles. (If there are air bubbles, puncture the hole with a needle, and then use a towel to escape the air.
